name: motor-control
format:
<head>

<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Satisfy&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cinzel:wght@800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Pacifico&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>
:root {
    --dist_change: 40px;
}
/* icon */
.nr-dashboard-button i {
    vertical-align: unset;
    width: unset;
}

.motor-control button {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;

    background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
    border-radius: 20px;    
    border: 1.1px solid grey;   
    
    scale: 0.7;
    font-size: 180px;
    opacity: 1;

    text-shadow: 2px 2px grey;
    color: black !important;
    box-shadow: 0 4px black,
                0 12px grey !important; 

    transition-duration: 0.4s;
    visibility: visible;
}
.motor-control button:hover {
    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;
    border: none;

    background: rgb(156,186,255);
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(156,186,255,1) 24%, 
                rgba(208,246,255,1) 53%, 
                rgba(211,255,239,1) 75%,
                rgba(226,255,206,1) 100%);
/*
    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;
    border: 0.9px solid #4682B4;
    box-shadow: none !important; 
    box-shadow: 0 1px #4682B4 !important; 
    
    background: rgb(2,0,36);
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%
    , rgba(9,9,121,1) 35%
    , rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);
*/
}
.motor-control button:active {
    transform: translateY(8px);
    box-shadow: 0 4px black !important;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ffc9da;
    color: #fe7ca5 !important;
    transition-duration: 0.4s;
/*
    background: rgb(136,136,255);
    background: linear-gradient(104deg, rgba(136,136,255,1) 22%
        , rgba(102,143,247,1) 44%
        , rgba(13,182,247,1) 66%
        , rgba(13,219,180,1) 100%);
*/
/*    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;

    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%
    , rgba(9,9,121,1) 35%
    , rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
*/
}


.ahead button {
    top: var(--dist_change);
}

.right button {
    right: var(--dist_change);
}


.back button { 
    bottom: var(--dist_change);
}

.left button {
    left: var(--dist_change);
}

.stop button {
    font-size: 96px;
}

.mode_title {
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: 800;

    /*background-color: white !important;
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1.1px solid grey;
    */
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    
    /*box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;
    */
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-align: left;
    font-family: 'Satisfy', cursive;
}
.mode_auto_title {
    transform: translateY(-28px);
    color: #4255f7 !important;
}
.mode_manual_title {
    color: #e79800 !important;
}
.mode_stop_title {
    transform: translateY(28px);
    color: #ce0020 !important;
}

.car_control_tag {
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: 800;
    transform: translateY(20px);
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: center;
    font-family: 'Cinzel', serif;
}
.mode_switching_tag {
    color: #EEE8AA !important;
}
.direction_tag {
    color: #ffb97b !important;
}
.speed_tag {
    color: #ff7e4e !important;
}

.keyboard_tag {
    font-size: 28px;
    /*font-weight: 200;
    */transform: translateY(-10px);
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    color: #ffdfb5 !important;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: center;
    font-family: 'Pacifico', cursive;
}
.keyboard_tag button {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1.05px solid grey;
    color: #3e3535 !important;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px grey;
    box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;

    /* Reference: https://linuxhint.com/disable-click-event-using-css/#:~:text=html,as%20%E2%80%9Cnone%E2%80%9D%3A */
    /* Làm cho button ko click được */
    pointer-events: none;

    visibility: visible;
}
</style>
</head>

name: Mode Switching CSS
Detect Keypress
format:
<script>
    (function($scope) {
    document.onkeydown = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": e.key.toLowerCase(),  "topic": "keydown"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
    
    document.onkeyup = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": "stop", "topic": "keyup"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
})(scope);
</script>

name: motor-control
format:
<head>

    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">

    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Satisfy&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

    <style>
        :root {
            --dist_change: 40px;
        }

        /* icon */
        .nr-dashboard-button i {
            vertical-align: unset;
            width: unset;
        }

        .motor-control button {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;

            background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
            border-radius: 20px;
            border: 1.1px solid grey;

            scale: 0.7;
            font-size: 180px;
            opacity: 1;

            text-shadow: 2px 2px grey;
            color: black !important;
            box-shadow: 0 4px black,
                0 12px grey !important;

            transition-duration: 0.4s;
            visibility: visible;
        }

        .motor-control button:hover {
            transition-duration: 0.2s;
            text-shadow: none;
            border: none;

            background: rgb(156, 186, 255);
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(156, 186, 255, 1) 24%,
                    rgba(208, 246, 255, 1) 53%,
                    rgba(211, 255, 239, 1) 75%,
                    rgba(226, 255, 206, 1) 100%);
            /*
    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;
    border: 0.9px solid #4682B4;
    box-shadow: none !important; 
    box-shadow: 0 1px #4682B4 !important; 
    
    background: rgb(2,0,36);
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%
    , rgba(9,9,121,1) 35%
    , rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);
*/
        }

        .motor-control button:active {
            transform: translateY(8px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px black !important;
            text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ffc9da;
            color: #fe7ca5 !important;
            transition-duration: 0.4s;
            /*
    background: rgb(136,136,255);
    background: linear-gradient(104deg, rgba(136,136,255,1) 22%
        , rgba(102,143,247,1) 44%
        , rgba(13,182,247,1) 66%
        , rgba(13,219,180,1) 100%);
*/
            /*    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;

    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%
    , rgba(9,9,121,1) 35%
    , rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
*/
        }


        .ahead button {
            top: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .right button {
            right: var(--dist_change);
        }


        .back button {
            bottom: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .left button {
            left: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .stop button {
            font-size: 96px;
        }

        .mode_title {
            font-size: 40px;
            font-weight: 800;

            /*background-color: white !important;
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1.1px solid grey;
    */
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;

            /*box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;
    */
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: left;
            font-family: 'Satisfy', cursive;
        }

        .mode_auto_title {
            transform: translateY(-28px);
            color: #4255f7 !important;
        }

        .mode_manual_title {
            color: #e79800 !important;
        }

        .mode_stop_title {
            transform: translateY(28px);
            color: #ce0020 !important;
        }

        .car_control_tag {
            font-size: 40px;
            font-weight: 800;
            transform: translateY(20px);
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;

            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: center;
            vertical-align: center;
            font-family: 'Cinzel', serif;
        }

        .mode_switching_tag {
            color: #EEE8AA !important;
        }

        .direction_tag {
            color: #ffb97b !important;
        }

        .speed_tag {
            color: #ff7e4e !important;
        }

        .keyboard_tag {
            font-size: 28px;
            /*font-weight: 200;
    */
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
            color: #ffdfb5 !important;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: center;
            vertical-align: center;
            font-family: 'Pacifico', cursive;
        }

        .keyboard_tag button {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 1.05px solid grey;
            color: #3e3535 !important;
            text-shadow: 1px 1px grey;
            box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;

            /* Reference: https://linuxhint.com/disable-click-event-using-css/#:~:text=html,as%20%E2%80%9Cnone%E2%80%9D%3A */
            /* Làm cho button ko click được */
            pointer-events: none;

            visibility: visible;
        }
    </style>
</head>

name: Mode Switching CSS
Detect Keypress
format:
<script>
    (function($scope) {
    document.onkeydown = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": e.key.toLowerCase(),  "topic": "keydown"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
    
    document.onkeyup = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": "stop", "topic": "keyup"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
})(scope);
</script>

name: keyup -> nhận 1 lần, keydown -> nhận nhiều lần

<style>
    :root {
        --border_rad: 12px;
        --pad_value: 5px;
    }

    .light-button button {
        width: 100%;
        scale: 0.9;
        bottom: 12px;

    }
    .light-button button:active {
        transform: translateY(5px);
        box-shadow: 0 5px #666 !important;
        transition-duration: 0.4s;
    }

    .on-button {
    }
    .on-button button:hover {
        transition-duration: 0.2s;
        background-color: #008000 !important;
        border: 2px solid #008000 !important;
    }

    .off-button button {
        border: 2px solid #CD1818 !important;
        background-color: rgba(250, 95, 85,0.85) !important;

    }

        height: 100%;

    }

name: motor-control
format:
<head>

    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Satisfy&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cinzel:wght@800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Pacifico&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

    <style>
        :root {
            --dist_change: 40px;
        }

        /* icon */
        .nr-dashboard-button i {
            vertical-align: unset;
            width: unset;
        }

        .motor-control button {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;

            background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
            border-radius: 20px;
            border: 1.1px solid grey;

            scale: 0.7;
            font-size: 180px;
            opacity: 1;

            text-shadow: 2px 2px grey;
            color: black !important;
            box-shadow: 0 4px black,
                0 12px grey !important;

            transition-duration: 0.4s;
            visibility: visible;
        }

        .motor-control button:hover {
            transition-duration: 0.2s;
            text-shadow: none;
            border: none;

            background: rgb(156, 186, 255);
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(156, 186, 255, 1) 24%,
                    rgba(208, 246, 255, 1) 53%,
                    rgba(211, 255, 239, 1) 75%,
                    rgba(226, 255, 206, 1) 100%);
        }

        .motor-control button:active {
            transform: translateY(8px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px black !important;
            text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ffc9da;
            color: #fe7ca5 !important;
            transition-duration: 0.4s;
        }


        .ahead button {
            top: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .right button {
            right: var(--dist_change);
        }


        .back button {
            bottom: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .left button {
            left: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .stop button {
            font-size: 96px;
        }

        .mode_title {
            font-size: 40px;
            font-weight: 800;

            /*background-color: white !important;
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1.1px solid grey;
    */
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;

            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: left;
            font-family: 'Satisfy', cursive;
        }

        .mode_auto_title {
            transform: translateY(-28px);
            color: #4255f7 !important;
        }

        .mode_manual_title {
            color: #e79800 !important;
        }

        .mode_stop_title {
            transform: translateY(28px);
            color: #ce0020 !important;
        }

        .car_control_tag {
            font-size: 40px;
            font-weight: 800;
            transform: translateY(20px);
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;

            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: center;
            vertical-align: center;
            font-family: 'Cinzel', serif;
        }

        .mode_switching_tag {
            color: #EEE8AA !important;
        }

        .direction_tag {
            color: #ffb97b !important;
        }

        .speed_tag {
            color: #ff7e4e !important;
        }

        .keyboard_tag {
            font-size: 28px;
            /*font-weight: 200;
    */
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
            color: #ffdfb5 !important;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: center;
            vertical-align: center;
            font-family: 'Pacifico', cursive;
        }

        .keyboard_tag button {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 1.05px solid grey;
            color: #3e3535 !important;
            text-shadow: 1px 1px grey;
            box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;

            /* Reference: https://linuxhint.com/disable-click-event-using-css/#:~:text=html,as%20%E2%80%9Cnone%E2%80%9D%3A */
            /* Làm cho button ko click được */
            pointer-events: none;

            visibility: visible;
        }
    </style>
</head>

name: Mode Switching CSS
Detect Keypress
format:
<script>
    (function($scope) {
    document.onkeydown = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": e.key.toLowerCase(),  "topic": "keydown"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
    
    document.onkeyup = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": "stop", "topic": "keyup"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
})(scope);
</script>

name: keyup -> nhận 1 lần, keydown -> nhận nhiều lần
Do nothing
func: return msg;

name: motor-control
format:
<head>

    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Satisfy&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cinzel:wght@800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Pacifico&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

    <style>
        :root {
            --dist_change: 40px;
        }

        /* icon */
        .nr-dashboard-button i {
            vertical-align: unset;
            width: unset;
        }

        .motor-control button {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;

            background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
            border-radius: 20px;
            border: 1.1px solid grey;

            scale: 0.7;
            font-size: 180px;
            opacity: 1;

            text-shadow: 2px 2px grey;
            color: black !important;
            box-shadow: 0 4px black,
                0 12px grey !important;

            transition-duration: 0.4s;
            visibility: visible;
        }

        .motor-control button:hover {
            transition-duration: 0.2s;
            text-shadow: none;
            border: none;

            background: rgb(156, 186, 255);
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(156, 186, 255, 1) 24%,
                    rgba(208, 246, 255, 1) 53%,
                    rgba(211, 255, 239, 1) 75%,
                    rgba(226, 255, 206, 1) 100%);
        }

        .motor-control button:active {
            transform: translateY(8px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px black !important;
            text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ffc9da;
            color: #fe7ca5 !important;
            transition-duration: 0.4s;
        }


        .ahead button {
            top: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .right button {
            right: var(--dist_change);
        }


        .back button {
            bottom: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .left button {
            left: var(--dist_change);
        }

        .stop button {
            font-size: 96px;
        }

        .mode_title {
            font-size: 40px;
            font-weight: 800;

            /*background-color: white !important;
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1.1px solid grey;
    */
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;

            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: left;
            font-family: 'Satisfy', cursive;
        }

        .mode_auto_title {
            transform: translateY(-28px);
            color: #4255f7 !important;
        }

        .mode_manual_title {
            color: #e79800 !important;
        }

        .mode_stop_title {
            transform: translateY(28px);
            color: #ce0020 !important;
        }

        .car_control_tag {
            font-size: 40px;
            font-weight: 800;
            transform: translateY(20px);
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;

            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: center;
            vertical-align: center;
            font-family: 'Cinzel', serif;
        }

        .mode_switching_tag {
            color: #EEE8AA !important;
        }

        .direction_tag {
            color: #ffb97b !important;
        }

        .speed_tag {
            color: #ff7e4e !important;
        }

        .keyboard_tag {
            font-size: 28px;
            /*font-weight: 200;
    */
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
            color: #ffdfb5 !important;
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            text-align: center;
            vertical-align: center;
            font-family: 'Pacifico', cursive;
        }

        .keyboard_tag button {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
            border-radius: 10px;
            border: 1.05px solid grey;
            color: #3e3535 !important;
            text-shadow: 1px 1px grey;
            box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;

            /* Reference: https://linuxhint.com/disable-click-event-using-css/#:~:text=html,as%20%E2%80%9Cnone%E2%80%9D%3A */
            /* Làm cho button ko click được */
            pointer-events: none;

            visibility: visible;
        }
    </style>
</head>

name: Mode Switching CSS
Detect Keypress
format:
<script>
    (function($scope) {
    document.onkeydown = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": e.key.toLowerCase(),  "topic": "keydown"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
    
    document.onkeyup = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": "stop", "topic": "keyup"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
})(scope);
</script>

name: keyup -> nhận 1 lần, keydown -> nhận nhiều lần
Do nothing
func: return msg;
